title: Ants on screen funny joke
summary: Ants on the screen of your phone.
developerAddress:
Just4Fun Mobile Sp. z o.o.
Polna 31, 05-800 Pruszków, Poland
description: Application "Ants on screen funny joke" will display a realistic animation of walking ants on the screen of your phone. It will look as if the real ants were walking on your phone. Your phone will change into a virtual anthill. Insects will be running from one edge of the phone to the other one. Frightening ants will always be displayed in the foreground. You can browse the Internet, play your favourite game, check your emails on the phone and little intruders will always be visible. Smooth and natural animation of ants will make your friends be impressed. They can be pretty scared or think that virtual ants have settled down in your phone. You can set the time after which the insects are supposed to show up on the screen. You can remove them any time using the button in notification bar.How to use ants simulator:1. Borrow mobile telephone from your friend under pretext of eg. checking train schedule in the Internet.2. Install "Ants on phone funny joke" on his phone.3. Set the time after which the ants are supposed to appear, eg. 5 seconds and press "Show ants"4. Give the phone back to your friend and observe his reaction. For sure he will be shocked!Why you should install this app on your phone?- realistic animation of ants- insects always visible on the screen- possibility of setting the time after which ants will appear on the screen.
descriptionHTML:
Application "Ants on screen funny joke" will display a realistic animation of walking ants on the screen of your phone. It will look as if the real ants were walking on your phone. Your phone will change into a virtual anthill. Insects will be running from one edge of the phone to the other one. Frightening ants will always be displayed in the foreground. You can browse the Internet, play your favourite game, check your emails on the phone and little intruders will always be visible. Smooth and natural animation of ants will make your friends be impressed. They can be pretty scared or think that virtual ants have settled down in your phone.

You can set the time after which the insects are supposed to show up on the screen. You can remove them any time using the button in notification bar.

How to use ants simulator:
1. Borrow mobile telephone from your friend under pretext of eg. checking train schedule in the Internet.
2. Install "Ants on phone funny joke" on his phone.
3. Set the time after which the ants are supposed to appear, eg. 5 seconds and press "Show ants"
4. Give the phone back to your friend and observe his reaction. For sure he will be shocked!

Why you should install this app on your phone?
- realistic animation of ants
- insects always visible on the screen
- possibility of setting the time after which ants will appear on the screen.
comments: The ants are returning to the screen to quickly, after disappearing from the screen. I suggest maybe 10 seconds before returning; ants wouldn't be so annoying. Another suggestion, an opportunity to make ants even smaller.  Namasté...

A very good app. The ants move pretty fast and smoothly even on my not so powerful phone. The ants picture/animation is pretty sharp and crisp but one should be able to reduce the size of the ants even more.
Looks good. It would be nice if I could make the ants smaller.
Its good. Its better if you remove the adds. Thanks
recentChanges: * Ant size adjustment fixed for some phones
* Minor ants on screen bug fixed
